sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Booking.css"; const Booking = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", phone: "", checkIn: "", checkOut: "", roomType: "Standard Room - ₹1,999/night", guests: "2 Guests", requests: "", }); const [summary, setSummary] = useState({ nights: 0, roomPrice: 1999, roomCharges: 0, tax: 0, total: 0, }); // Update prices when room type or dates change useEffect(() => { const priceMap = { "Standard Room": 1999, "Deluxe Room": 2999, "Traditional Suite": 3499, "Premium Suite": 4999, "Family Room": 5999, "Royal Suite": 7999, }; const roomTypeName = formData.roomType.split("-")[0].trim(); const roomPrice = priceMap[roomTypeName] || 1999; const checkInDate = new Date(formData.checkIn); const checkOutDate = new Date(formData.checkOut); const diffTime = checkOutDate - checkInDate; const nights = diffTime > 0 ? diffTime / (1000 * 3600 * 24) : 0; const roomCharges = nights * roomPrice; const tax = roomCharges * 0.12; // 12% tax const total = roomCharges + tax; setSummary({ nights, roomPrice, roomCharges, tax, total, }); }, [formData.checkIn, formData.checkOut, formData.roomType]); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert("Proceeding to Payment..."); }; // Disable past dates const today = new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0]; return (

Book Your Stay

Fill in the details below to reserve your room at Maheshwari Nivas

{/* Left: Booking Form */}
Booking Details
{/* Personal Information */}
Personal Information
Full Name *
Phone Number *
Email *
{/* Stay Details */}
Stay Details
Check-in Date * Check-out Date * Room Type * Number of Guests * Special Requests
{/* Right: Booking Summary */}
Booking Summary

Room Type

{formData.roomType.split("-")[0]}

Duration

{formData.checkIn && formData.checkOut ? `${new Date( formData.checkIn ).toLocaleDateString()} - ${new Date( formData.checkOut ).toLocaleDateString()}` : "—"} {summary.nights > 0 && ( <> {" "}   ({summary.nights} night {summary.nights > 1 ? "s" : ""}) )}

Guests

{formData.guests}

Room Charges ₹{summary.roomCharges.toLocaleString()}
Taxes & Fees (12%) ₹{summary.tax.toLocaleString()}
Total Amount ₹{summary.total.toLocaleString()}
  • ✓ Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in
  • ✓ Complimentary breakfast included
  • ✓ Free WiFi & parking
); }; export default Booking;
